wgt:enabling-condition.wgt:tooltip: Переоткрыть случай невозможно, по нему сформирован счет-реестр

fs:row.style: float: right; position: relative; bottom: 42px; right:39px;

ctrl:classifier.label: Случай обращения

ctrl:button.label: Новый случай
ctrl:button.ctrl:set-value-expression: var o = { id: null, name: 'Новый случай', caseOpenDate: mcCaseDef.caseOpenDate, fundingSourceType: mcCaseDef.fundingSourceType, caseType: mcCaseDef.caseType, careRegimen: mcCaseDef.careRegimen, careLevel: mcCaseDef.careLevel, openMoreInfo: true, firstVisitDate: mcCaseDef.caseOpenDate, caseInitGoal: mcCaseDef.caseInitGoal, careProvidingForm: mcCaseDef.careProvidingForm, careProvisionCondition: mcCaseDef.careProvisionCondition, isNewCheck: !mcCase.isNewCheck, newCase: true } o

ctrl:dependencies.ctrl:enabling-condition: mcCase.caseOpenDate != null && mcCase.fundingSourceType != null && mcCase.caseType != null && mcCase.careRegimen != null && mcCase.caseInitGoal != null

ctrl:text-area.label: Состояние слизистой оболочки полости рта, десен, альвеолярных отростков и неба

wgt:show-modal.page-name: Отказ от справки о стоимости услуг
